body.p:
Owingsville Ky
July 16th 1861 --
Govenor B. Magoffin
Frankfort Ky --
Dear Sir --

I write you this note requesting you to reappoint and Commission F. E. Congleton a Notary Public in and for the County of Bath. His commission expires 14th august/61 -- He is cashier of the Deposit Bank of Boyd Congleton & Co at Sharpsburg, and is a very estimable gentleman.
Send the Commission to me when issued. If the Secretary has any fees or costs, direct him to send statement of the amount also, and I will see that it is paid immediately.

Bath Co
Notary
F. E. Congleton
